humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are metastatic carcinomas identified in 6 out of 32 lymph nodes. Based on the new rules provided, this corresponds to N1 stage, as N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. The exact number of positive lymph nodes in the N1 category is not specified, so the exact number of positive lymph nodes (6) does not affect the N stage prediction.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are 32 lymph nodes examined, and metastatic carcinoma is found in 6 of them (6/32). This corresponds to N1 stage based on the 8th edition of the AJCC cancer staging manual.
